title: [Onboarding] Splash screen
body:
Implement splash screen for ios and Android

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11790366/57216652-bd48a680-6ff0-11e9-90b1-3dee121f6dc9.png)

Figma: https://www.figma.com/file/dEIljL7UPbXgsZUA0Q4qlE5E/Onboarding?node-id=927%3A14702

Issue Status: 1. **Open** 2. Started 3. Submitted 4. Done
__This issue now has a funding of 150.0 DAI (150.0 USD @ $1.0/DAI) attached to it.__ * If you would like to work on this issue you can 'start work' [on the Gitcoin Issue Details page](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/8130/3127). * Want to chip in? Add your own contribution [here](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/8130/3127). * Questions? Checkout Gitcoin Help or the Gitcoin Slack * $84,674.80 more funded OSS Work available on the [Gitcoin Issue Explorer](https://gitcoin.co/explorer)
Why is this Clojure related?

➤ Rachel Hamlin commented:

Waiting to get bounty applicant approved; will then estimate date.

Not yet, couldn't figure out this iOS 13 issue so far.
ios 13 in beta right? maybe we could merge for now? and test it later in release or maybe it will be fixed in react native ?
@siphiuel ^
sure, that was the original question i had. Okay lets merge
